remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示由复合活动管理的子活动的集合。Represents the collection of child activities managed by the composite activity. 可以更新此集合。This collection can be updated. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何创建活动并将其作为子级添加到复合活动中，还演示如何设置此类型的 许可。The following code shows how to create activities and add them as children to a composite activity and includes setting the permissive for this type. 此代码示例摘自 ThrowWorkFlow.cs 文件中的“引发 SDK”示例。This code example is part of the Throw SDK sample and is from the ThrowWorkFlow.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Throw 示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc)。For more information, see [Throw Sample](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#179](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets11.cs#179)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#179](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets11.vb#179)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何创建活动并将其作为子级添加到复合活动中，还演示如何设置此类型的 许可。The following code shows how to create activities and add them as children to a composite activity and includes setting the permissive for this type. 此代码示例摘自 ThrowWorkFlow.cs 文件中的“引发 SDK”示例。This code example is part of the Throw SDK sample and is from the ThrowWorkFlow.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Throw 示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc)。For more information, see [Throw Sample](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc). param.name: disposing
param.span: 为 则释放此实例及其所有子活动占用的托管资源和非托管资源；为 则只释放此实例占用的非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources used by this instance and all child activities of this instance; to release only the unmanaged resources of this instance.

summary.span: 在此实例上调用 ，并可以选择在此实例的所有子活动上调用 。

span.span: Calls on this instance, and optionally calls on all child activities of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在活动的整个生存期中，可能会创建或释放多个 .NET 对象。Throughout an activity's lifetime, several .NET objects may be created or disposed. 每次从内存中卸载工作流实例时，释放与工作流树中的活动对应的 .NET 对象（在每个活动上调用 方法）。Every time a workflow instance is unloaded from memory, the .NET objects corresponding to the activities in the workflow tree are disposed (the method is called on each activity). 将工作流实例重新加载回内存时，使用对应卸载操作中的状态为每个活动创建新的 .NET 对象。When the workflow instance is loaded back into memory, a new .NET object is created for each activity with the state from the corresponding unload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于活动清理，例如清除依赖属性和删除队列。This method is used for activity cleanup, such as clearing dependency properties and deleting queues.
